block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are Katie Roiphe on A. M. Homes (above, in the mid-'60s); Alex Kuczynski on Paulina Porizkova; and John Rockwell on Columbia Records. Dwight Garner, the senior editor of the Book Review, is the guest host.
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''A Model Summer,'' by Paulina Porizkova; ''Evolution for Everyone,'' by David Sloan Wilson; and other books.
Search: A free archive of book reviews since 1981.
Books Update E-Mail: Receive a selective overview of new book reviews and features every Sunday.
